section.title: Diagram view
section.para: The faces-config file diagram view editor enables editing the file with the aid of a graphical point, drag and click graphical interface. Use of the digram view is described in .

note.title: **Design Note***
note.para: A link to the relevant "Documentation navigation" section (as in the tasks section) would be relevant where the editor relates to a single feature (or concept) detailed in the Concepts chapter. The Hibernate Tools Reference Guide contains an example. The Hibernate mapping editor is linked to the Mapping section of the "Document navigation" chapter.
